backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
bottomImages.comment: List of URLs to randomly pick from for the bottom image
dividerBuffer.comment: The blank spacing above and below the divider bar separating images. Use 0 for no blank spacing
dividerHeight.comment: The height of the divider bar, in pixels. Use 0 for no divider bar between images
headerIconStyle.comment: The style to render the system info icons in the header area

headerIconStyle.choices.colorful: accents match random header color, good/warn/danger is standard color
headerIconStyle.choices.monochromatic: accents and good/warn/danger match random header color

headerSVG.comment: URL to a scalable vector graphic to use as the header
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
topImages.comment: List of URLs to randomly pick from for the top image
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use tor socks proxy for privacy.
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
